messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] We have a tarantula in the house
messages.msgSnippet: My son has mentioned spiders as pets before.  Right now, it s impossible because we re in Hawaii and tarantulas aren t allowed- which is perfectly okay with
messages.messageBody:
My son has mentioned spiders as pets before. Right now, it's impossible because we're in Hawaii and tarantulas aren't allowed- which is perfectly okay with me.. I'm an arachnophobe! It's selfish, but I hope he loses interest by the time we move back to the mainland. I'm scared to death of all spiders.

Tina

Ren Allen <starsuncloud@...> wrote:
~It
wouldn't surprise me a bit if snakes were the next thing on my son's
agenda.~

Very cool!
Corn snakes make really great pets.

We once had a tarantula named "Rosie". She died when her molt didn't
complete (apparently that happens occasionally with them).

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
